articles.title: Netflix tells investors to reject mini-tender offer by TRC Capital
articles.mainIdea: Netflix tells investors to reject mini-tender offer by TRC Capital
articles.summary: TipRanks: Netflix tells investors to reject mini-tender offer by TRC Capital. Netflix (NFLX) said it as been notified of an “unsolicited” mini-tender offer by TRC Capital Investment to purchase up to 1.25M shares of Netflix common stock at a price of $91.00 per share in cash. The offer is for less than 0.03% of the shares of Netflix common stock outstanding. Netflix recommends that shareholders reject TRC’s unsolicited offer. “TRC’s offer price is below the current market price for shares of Netflix common stock. articles.title: Should You Sell Netflix Stock Before It Wins the Warner Bros Takeover?
articles.mainIdea: Should You Sell Netflix Stock Before It Wins the Warner Bros Takeover?
articles.summary: Barchart: Should You Sell Netflix Stock Before It Wins the Warner Bros Takeover?. Netflix stock faces near-term pressure from its blockbuster bid for Warner Bros. assets, even as Wall Street remains largely bullish on the company’s long-term growth prospects. Related tickers mentioned: CMCSA, WBD.
